channel.title: CVE Feed for Akana -- Community Manager Developer Portal
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Akana -- Community Manager Developer Portal

item.title: CVE-2024-2796|2024-07-30T17:57:22.042Z -- akana -- community%20manager%20developer%20portal
item.description: A server-side request forgery (SSRF) was discovered in the Akana Community Manager Developer Portal in versions prior to and including 2022.1.3. Reported by Jakob Antonsson.
